acBusinessPhone.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "businessPhone" property for an account.

acContentLocale.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "contentLocale" property for an account.

acDescription.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "description" property for an account.

acEmail.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "email" property for an account.

acEncoding.description: Specifies if the claims in the id_token are URL encoded.

acFaxPhone.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "faxPhone" property for an account.

acGivenName.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "givenName" property for an account.

acHomePhone.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "homePhone" property for an account.

acMemberOf.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "memberOf" property for an account.

acMobilePhone.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "mobilePhone" property for an account.

acName.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "name" property for an account.

acPagerPhone.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "pagerPhone" property for an account.

acPostalAddr.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "postalAddress" property for an account.

acProductLocale.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "productLocale" property for an account.

acSurname.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "surname" property for an account.

acUsername.description: Specifies the OIDC claim used for the "userName" property for an account.

accountCamidProperty.description: Specifies the value used to uniquely identify account objects.

accountClaims.description: Specifies if the id_token contains all of the account claims.

advancedProperties.description: Specifies a set of advanced properties.

authScope.description: Specifies the scope parameter values provided to the authorize endpoint.

clientId.description: Specifies the OpenID Connect client identifier.

clientSecret.description: Specifies the client secret that is assigned to the application by the OpenID Connect identity provider.

customProperties.description: Specifies a set of custom properties.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the authentication namespace.

identityProviderType.description: Specifies the implementation of an OpenID Connect identity provider.

idpCertificateFile.description: Specifies the location of the certificate that is used by the OpenID Connect identity provider to sign the identity token.

jwksEndpoint.description: Specifies the OpenID Connect endpoint for retrieving JWT signing keys.

keyLocation.description: Specifies the location of the signing public key or certificate.

oidcAuthEndpoint.description: Specifies the OpenID Connect authorization endpoint, using the following syntax: https://<hostname:port>/<path>

oidcDiscEndpoint.description: Specifies the OpenID Connect discovery endpoint.

oidcTokenEndpoint.description: Specifies the OpenID Connect token endpoint, using the following syntax: https://<hostname:port>/<path>

pgAddParams.description: Specifies any additional parameters that are required for the password grant flow.

pgInclScope.description: Specifies that the scope should be included when using the password grant flow.

pgStrategy.description: Specifies how to get the user's identity when using the password grant flow.

privateKeyFile.description: Specifies the file that contains the private signing key.

privateKeyId.description: Specifies the key identifier that should be placed in the JWT header.

privateKeyPassword.description: Specifies the private key password used to protect the private signing key.

returnUrl.description: Return URL that is configured with the OpenID Connect identity provider.

selectableForAuth.description: Specifies whether the namespace is selectable for authentication.

tcAccountClaims.description: Specifies if the id_token contains all of the account claims.

tcStrategy.description: Specifies the information that should be stored for scheduling jobs.

tenantBoundingSetMapping.description: Specifies how the tenant bounding set is determined for a user.

tenantIdMapping.description: Specifies how namespace users are mapped to tenant IDs.

tokenEndpointAuth.description: Specifies how to authenticate to the Identity Provider when invoking the token endpoint.

useDiscoveryEndpoint.description: Specifies whether the Identity Provider returns a discovery document.
